accept conditions: I accept the DMV terms and conditions
access pending description:
Authorize users to gain access to a veterinary practice.
Member access requests must be accepted by the person Responsible in the veterinary practice.
Responsible access requests must be approved by Nicole Fortin or Noël Grospeiller after contacting them by telephone in order to validate the authenticity of the request.
Pending requests can only be authorized by Nicole Fortin or Noël Grospeiller.

conditions text:
Terms and Conditions of the CHATDMVET Mobile Application and Release of Responsibility


Terms of use CHATDMVET Mobile Application

GROUPE DIMENSION MULTI VETERINAIRE INC. is the sole owner and operator of the chatDMVet mobile application.

You acknowledge that you are over 18 years of age and use the information provided by this service for personal purposes.

In this document, the terms used to designate users are taken in the generic sense; they are both feminine and masculine.

The use of the chatDMVet mobile application is subject to the following conditions. If you do not accept them, please do not access or use the chatDMVet mobile application. GROUPE DIMENSION MULTI VETERINAIRE INC. may modify these conditions at any time without notice. By using the chatDMVet application, you accept the following conditions.

Protection of personal data

The data collected by user registration is secure and cannot be transmitted to any other entity not transacting with GROUPE DIMENSION MULTI VETERINAIRE INC. and its appointed partners, without the consent of registered members and having duly completed and accepted these terms and conditions. In order to improve the delivery of its services, GROUPE DIMENSION MULTI VETERINAIRE INC. or its designated partners may use your personal data for surveys or promotional information. If you do not wish to be contacted, you can send a request by email : chatDMVet@centredmv.com.

Disclaimer

The documents provided on this site are offered for informational purposes only. They constitute general information concerning the activities and events of GROUPE DIMENSION MULTI VETERINAIRE INC.

GROUPE DIMENSION MULTI VETERINAIRE INC. will not be held responsible, under no circumstances, for any damage that may arise from an error on this site.

Modifications

GROUPE DIMENSION MULTI VETERINAIRE INC. reserves the right to modify, without notice and at any time, any information or document available on this website.

Confidentiality of communications

GROUPE DIMENSION MULTI VETERINAIRE INC. guarantees the confidentiality of communications sent through its mobile application.

Although GROUPE DIMENSION MULTI VETERINAIRE INC. has made reasonable efforts to ensure that the documents contained in the mobile application are accurate, they cannot guarantee that the documents are exact, current or exhaustive, that the mobile application will be available without interruption, error or omission, that the defects will be corrected, nor that the servers which make it available are free of viruses or harmful components. The mobile application and documents are provided « as is » and « as available » without declaration, warranty or condition of any kind, expressed or implied.

Limitation of liability

GROUPE DIMENSION MULTI VETERINAIRE INC. and its associates assume no responsibility for any damage arising from the misuse of information provided on the mobile application.

By accepting these terms and conditions, you declare that you have read and agree with all the policies, regulations and terms described in this document and acknowledge that the messages and information received during discussions by chatDMVet:
  • Cannot be retained to make a diagnosis or receive a prescription.
  • May not be used, cited or produced in the event of litigation or a legal conflict as proof of veterinary advice or proof of a veterinarian-patient relationship as defined by the code of ethics M-8, r. 4 - Code of ethics of veterinary medicine.
Furthermore, the use of the service must in no event serve as a substitution to respond to an emergency situation and cannot replace a veterinary consultation in one of the DMV Veterinary Centers or even create a regular patient-veterinary relationship.

You acknowledge that you are using the information provided by this service as an additional source of information and that full responsibility for the decisions, diagnoses and other prescriptions communicated to the patient is under the cover of your full and entire responsibility, hence engaging solely your professional responsibility.Not having all the details of the animal patient record and without having created a regular or occasional patient-veterinary relationship, the messages and information received during the discussions by chatDMVet do not engage the professional responsibility of the respondents of the DMV Centers.

Copyright and authorized use

The copyright in the mobile application and all the documents contained therein belong to GROUPE DIMENSION MULTI VETERINAIRE INC. The chatDMVet mobile application may not be reproduced, in whole or in part, without the prior express written consent of GROUPE DIMENSION MULTI VETERINAIRE INC. To obtain this consent, please contact GROUPE DIMENSION MULTI VETERINAIRE INC. by email at chatDMVet@centredmv.com.

Links

GROUPE DIMENSION MULTI VETERINAIRE INC. provides links to third party sites only as a service for users of the chatDMVet mobile app. GROUPE DIMENSION MULTI VETERINAIRE INC. assumes no responsibility for the content of any site linked to its own and the inclusion of a link does not indicate or imply that GROUPE DIMENSION MULTI VETERINAIRE INC. endorse the content.

Governing Law & JurisdictionThese conditions of use will be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the province of Quebec (Canada). Any litigation related to these will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of the province of Quebec.

dmv contact appointment: Contact or specialty of DMV Centers
dmv home subtitle: Stop wasting it on the phone!
dmv radio text: IDEAL option for transferring x-rays for a patient referred to the DMV Center and for whom there is no request for interpretation by a radiologist.
dmv text:
Chat 24/7 with the 3 DMV Veterinary Centers, DMV-North, DMV-South and DMV-MTL

Benefit from privileged and direct access to 25 Specialized Services & 24/7 to Customer Care Representatives as well as Emergencies complimentary to your family veterinarian

Ah! And I mustn’t forget, still no general practice,
Speak with your family veterinarian, It’s his specialty:)
engagement: Since 1993, the DMV Centers have been committed to collaborating with family veterinarians to innovate, grow and advance veterinary health.

events to come description:
Never miss important upcoming animal health events!
Click on an event (remote or in person) that inspires you to learn more, then subscribe to events of interest to you.
You will receive notification at the beginning of each activity you have subscribed to.
You know of an animal health event or activity that is not listed? Send a message to Nicole Fortin
for more information: For more information contact DMV Centers at 514-633-8888
form error message: Some mandatory fields are empty or incorrectly filled
important text: This form is reserved SOLELY for sending x-rays for a referred patient. FOR AN INTERPRETATION REQUEST BY ONE OF OUR RADIOLOGISTS use DMV Radio-Vision on Timeless
important text 2: Unfortunately, a request for interpretation received via this form cannot be processed.
jpeg text: The JPEG option should be used as a last resort if the other options have failed. The JPEG format is not suitable for evaluating X-Rays and can result in reading errors.
last message intended to you: Last message is intended to you
my activities description:
Participate in activities that enrich you!
Click on an activity (remote or in person) that inspires you to learn more, then subscribe to activities of interest to you.
You will receive notification at the beginning of each activity you have subscribed to.
You know of an animal health event or activity that is not listed? Send a message to Nicole Fortin
my establishments description:
In which practice(s) do you work for the welfare of our furry friends?
Request an access to the veterinary practices you work for in order to chat 24/7 with the 3 DMV Veterinary Centers’ teams; DMV-North, DMV-South and DMV-Mtl.
Click on Member if you are not the owner or click on Responsible if you are the owner or the manager
